paymentSettings.stripeSettingsDescription: Don't have a Stripe API Client ID?
paymentSettings.stripeClientIdWarning: The Client ID is a PUBLIC field. Please ensure you're using the client_id found on the Stripe Connect settings page.

connect.stripeConnectNotEnabled: Stripe Connect is not enabled for this application. Please contact the adminstrator.
connect.shopEmailNotConfigured: Please configure your shop email first.
connect.shopAddressNotConfigured: Please configure your shop address first
connect.applicationFeeDescription: This number represents a percentage fee that the marketplace (this shop) takes for any item which is sold by a merchant shop for this marketplace. This fee applies only if Stripe Connect is setup and enabled on both the marketplace and the merchant shops and if Stripe is the payment provider used to perform the checkout.

redirect.stripeConnectWaitingNote: Will auto redirect in a couple seconds or click here.

errorMessages.cardDeclined: Your card has been declined. Please use another card.
errorMessages.expiredCard: Your card has expired. Please check the expiration date or use a different card.
errorMessages.incompleteCVC: Your card's security code is incomplete.
errorMessages.incompleteExpiry: Your card's expiration date is incomplete.
errorMessages.incorrectCVC: Your card's security code is incorrect.
errorMessages.incorrectNumber: The card number is incorrect. Please check the cardâ€™s number or use a different card.
errorMessages.incorrectZIP: Your card's postal code is incorrect.
errorMessages.invalidExpiryMonth: Your card's expiration month is invalid.
errorMessages.invalidExpiryYear: Your card's expiration year is invalid.
errorMessages.incompleteExpiryMonthPast: Your card's expiration date is in the past.
errorMessages.incompleteExpiryYearPast: Your card's expiration year is in the past.
errorMessages.postalCodeInvalid: Your card's postal code is invalid.
errorMessages.whoops: Whoops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
